text: The Winter Youth Olympic Games or the Games of the Olympiad == List of modern Winter Youth Olympic Games == * 2012 - Games of the I Olympiad - Innsbruck, Austria * 2016 - Games of the II Olympiad - Lillehammer, Norway * 2020 - Games of the III Olympiad - Lausanne, Switzerland * 2024 - Games of the IV Olympiad - Gangwon, South Korea
title: Winter Youth Olympic Games
